00222    /*
00223    * Get the set of Links associated with an Atom by constant reference.
00224    */ 
00225    inline 
00226    const LinkMaster::AtomLinkSet& LinkMaster::atomLinkSet(const Atom& atom) const  
00227    {  
00228       return (atomLinkSets_[atom.id()]);

00240    /*
00241    * Initialize iterator to beginning of list of active links.
00242    */
00243    inline void LinkMaster::begin(LinkMaster::LinkIterator& iterator)
00244    {   linkSet_.begin(iterator); }

00249    inline void LinkMaster::begin(LinkMaster::ConstLinkIterator& iterator) const
00250    {   linkSet_.begin(iterator); }

00252    /*
00253    * Get an active Link by index.
00254    */ 
00255    inline Link& LinkMaster::link(int id) const
00256    {  return linkSet_[id]; }
00257 
00258    /*
00259    * Get number of active Links.
00260    */
